basic_info.description:
ðŸ‘‹ I'm Athmika Hebbar. I am a Software Engineer and a Researcher at the University of Edinburgh. I have two years of experience in crafting innovative and efficient software solutions. I thrive on solving complex problems and creating seamless user experiences through both backend and frontend development. 
I did my masters in Computer Science from the University of Edinburgh. Prior to this, I completed my Bachelor of Technology from University of Mumbai and worked as a Software Engineer at Helpshift. I enjoy solving coding problems on Leetcode.

projects.title: Recipe Search Engine
projects.description: Built a Recipe Search Engine as part of the â€˜Text Technologies for Data Scienceâ€™ course upon a large dataset of 2.2 million recipes using positional inverted index for information retrieval. This system was built using Django framework, react for the UI, MongoDB for storing the recipe data, and hosted on Google Cloud Server (GCP) with features like advanced search, query expansion, query optimization, live indexing, Redis caching.

projects.title: Flexibility Data Exploration
projects.description: Conducted data analysis using pandas on the Flexibility survey to find out patterns and insights in people's preferences in appliance use time shifting.

projects.title: Energy Management System
projects.description: Conducted extensive data mining activities on the IDEAL scottish household energy dataset to find anomalies and patterns using unsupervised learning and trained Machine Learning regression models to predict average monthly consumption and cost for Scottish households, enhancing results through visualisation.

projects.title: Flexibility Interface
projects.description: Developed a website using Wix's Velo API that allows users to simulate running their appliances at preferred time and finding out the cheapest time and savings if run on the Octopus Agile tariff instead of standard tariffs.
